ARTIST.citation: Animation can explain whatever the mind of man can conceive.
ARTIST.resume-expert: Passionate UX/UI designer blending 2D, 3D, and frontend for immersive experiences.
ARTIST.resume-music: Passionate about music, I play piano and sing covers of Lana Del Rey, Lady Gaga, and Celine Dion.
ARTIST.resume-aboutme: Curious about me? Discover my journey, the languages I speak, and my passion for music through piano and singing.
ARTIST.expert-ux:
Creativity and precision define my work ‚Äî I am a pixel-perfect UX/UI designer with a passion for crafting immersive digital experiences. Inspired by the surreal universe of Magritte, I bring a unique artistic touch to my designs, blending 2D and 3D visuals with a deep focus on user experience.

My key skills and expertise:
ARTIST.skill-1: UX/UI Design: Focus on user-centered, interactive, and aesthetic interfaces.
ARTIST.skill-2: Interactive Prototyping with Figma, Adobe XD, Zeplin, and Illustrator for engaging and dynamic mockups.
ARTIST.skill-3: 2D & 3D Design: Logo creation, 3D modeling, and immersive visual experiences with 3ds Max.
ARTIST.skill-4: Front-End Development: Expertise in Angular, React.js, Vue.js, TypeScript, SCSS, SASS.
ARTIST.skill-5: Responsive & Animated UI: Ensuring smooth interactions and seamless performance across devices.
ARTIST.expert-last:
I hold a Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science from the University of Namur (graduated with distinction), combining technical expertise with a deep understanding of design.

One of my most exciting projects was developing a chatbot for an escape game as part of my Master‚Äôs thesis‚Äîdemonstrating my ability to merge design and technology to create engaging digital experiences.
ARTIST.music:
Music is my passion, and I've been playing piano since I was 10. As a singer, I‚Äôm lucky to be coached by Aurore Sorce, a talented artist who excelled at the conservatory and closely guides me on my vocal journey.

I love performing covers of artists like Lana Del Rey, Lady Gaga, and C√©line Dion, bringing emotion and creativity to every note.

You can find some of my covers on Instagram and YouTube. Check the link in the footer!
ARTIST.aboutme: Curious about who I am? Explore my journey, the languages I speak, and my passion for music through piano and singing. Dive deeper into what drives me and how it influences both my work and creativity.
ARTIST.writetome: Feel free to get in touch with me for collaboration opportunities or inquiries. I'm always open to discuss new projects and share ideas. Let's create something amazing together!
ARTIST.resume-animal: Animal welfare is close to my heart. Sterilization and responsible adoption help reduce suffering and protect abandoned animals.
ARTIST.animal-1:
Animal welfare is a cause close to my heart. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Every day, associations and volunteers work tirelessly to improve the lives of abandoned animals. Their dedication is admirable, yet too many cats and dogs are still left to fend for themselves without a sustainable solution.
ARTIST.animal-2: One of the key solutions to this issue is sterilization. The overpopulation of stray cats is difficult to manage, leading to unnecessary suffering. Sterilization is a simple but crucial step in preventing this problem and improving animal welfare.
ARTIST.animal-3: We should also consider the condition of horses used for tourist rides. Instead of exploiting these animals for entertainment, motorized alternatives exist that can prevent their physical suffering.
ARTIST.animal-4: Animals are not just companions; they feel fear, pain, and deserve our respect. Everyone can play a role in their well-being by adopting more responsible behaviors.
ARTIST.animal-5:
I have personally adopted two cats, Batman and Lisa, who bring so much joy to my life.
On this topic, I highly recommend the film Flow, a silent yet deeply moving piece that beautifully portrays the sensitivity of animals. The black cat in the movie reminds me so much of my Batman, a loyal and charismatic companion!
ARTIST.animal-6: To learn more about feline overpopulation and GAIA‚Äôs campaign, you can visit this link: GAIA Campaign
ARTIST.resume-human: A small act of kindness can make a big difference. Helping others and protecting our planet starts with simple, everyday actions.
ARTIST.human-1:
A simple smile costs nothing and can brighten someone's day. üòä

In a world where many struggle with poverty and injustice, every action counts.
It is essential to think of others and take action, even in small ways, to create a more compassionate future.
ARTIST.human-2:
Thousands of organizations work every day to improve the lives of those in need.
Even a small donation can make a real difference. Here are some organizations striving for a better world:
  • UNICEF - Supporting children and their rights.
  • SOS Children's Villages - Protecting and educating vulnerable children.
  • Red Cross - Emergency relief and humanitarian aid.
ARTIST.human-3:
Our planet also needs us. üåç Small, simple actions can have a big impact:
  • Throwing waste in the bin instead of littering.
  • Turning off the water while soaping up in the shower to avoid waste.
  • Reducing food waste by adjusting portion sizes.
ARTIST.human-4:
Helping others and protecting the environment isn‚Äôt difficult. Let‚Äôs work together to be kinder and more responsible.

‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you for these small actions that, combined, can change the world.
ARTIST.resume-contact: Feel free to reach out for collaborations or questions. Let‚Äôs create something amazing together!

PORTFOLIO.citation: Simplicity is the principle of art.
PORTFOLIO.desc-games: As a designer and developer, I create interactive games with a focus on design, fully responsive on all devices. Technologies: Angular and ReactJS to ensure high performance and smooth interactivity.
PORTFOLIO.desc-expensemanagement: Expense management tool for Marco Vigna.
PORTFOLIO.desc-promockup: Find professional mockups for your projects.
PORTFOLIO.desc-logodesign: Creative logo designs for your brand.
PORTFOLIO.desc-ganeshalearning: üéì On this channel, we provide comprehensive tutorials on Angular 19 and other essential frontend topics. Master HTML, CSS, and Angular's powerful framework to build modern web applications.

Gano.title: Gano - Parody of Uno
Gano.description: A fun card game inspired by Uno, designed and developed with Angular 19 and Bootstrap. Now available on Tablet and Smartphone! I‚Äôve completely revamped the design for an even better experience. Have fun! GG (Good Game)!

Champion.title: QPUC 4 in a Row
Champion.description: The game is available in French and inspired by the famous 'Question pour un Champion'. Developed using ReactJS 19 and Vite, it also uses Bootstrap for a responsive and smooth experience. You can also play it on your smartphone!

EscapeGame.title: Escape Game - Super Mario Theme
EscapeGame.description: A chatbot in an escape game with a Super Mario theme, developed as part of my Master's thesis in Computer Science. I graduated with honors. It has recently been upgraded to Angular 19, optimized for smartphones, and redesigned using Bootstrap to ensure a responsive and smooth experience on any device.

MUSIC.resume-youtube: Subscribe to my YouTube channel for my latest song covers and vocal performances.
MUSIC.resume-insta: Check out my covers on Instagram, including Madonna's Frozen, Lana Del Rey's Summertime Sadness, and Emilia's Big Big World.

DESIGNER.resume-unamur: I completed a bachelor's and master's in computer science with an adjusted schedule at the University of Namur. A high-quality education I highly recommend!
DESIGNER.resume-chatbot: For my Master‚Äôs thesis at the University of Namur, I developed an immersive chatbot for an escape game, blending design and technology.
